application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
decision_conditions: The submitted details, with respect of condition 8, do not demonstrate that the proposed development will preserve and enhance the visual amenities and general amenities of the locality and provide adequate facilities in compliance with Policies DMHB 11, DMHB 12, DMHB 14 and DMT 2 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020), Policy G5 of the London Plan (2021) and Chapter 12 of the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).

The submitted details, with respect of condition 10, do not demonstrate that trees and other vegetation can and will be retained on site and not damaged during construction work to ensure that the development conforms with Policy DMHB 14 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020).

It is advised that no objections were raised in respect to the details submitted in respect to Conditions 3, 4, 5, 6 and 7. It is recommended that a separate application be submitted to discharge these conditions.
description: Details pursuant to the discharge of Conditions 3 (materials and external surfaces), 4 (demolition and construction management plan), 5 (Basement Impact Assessment), 6 (sustainable water management), 7 (step free access), 8 (landscape scheme) and 10 (method statement outlining) of planning permission ref. 38787/APP/2021/1713, dated 06-12-2021 (Demolition of the existing building and the erection of a 2 storey, 7 bedroom detached dwellinghouse, including the excavation of a basement to provide habitable space and a sunken squash court with associated works)
